attributes.action: Compulsory Community Work For Long Term Unemployed Benefit Recipiants
attributes.additional_details: Anybody recieving benefits for a period of longer than 3 months who is out of work but is fit and able to work, should carry out work within the community to support the local community with their access to readily available free time they are ideal candidates for community needed tasks such as care work, street cleaning and other tasks that benefit local communities. If the community is supporting them, they too should be prepared to support the community. So that the tax burden they cause can be saved elsewhere.
